ja543:29.3.pli: Taṃ maṃ mataṃ vā jīvaṃ vā,

ja543:127.2.pli: Yaññā ca vedā ca subhoga loke;

ja543:138.3.pli: Ete ca aññe ca nagā mahantā,

ja543:148.1.pli: Atha ce hi ete na karonti puññaṃ,

ja543:162.1.pli: Sace hi so sujjhati yo hanāti,

ja543:163.1.pli: Neva migā na pasū nopi gāvo,

ja543:174.3.pli: Ete ca aññe ca nagā mahantā,

ja543:176.2.pli: Na tattha sañjāyati ayo na lohaṃ;
